name: Niko the Fox
description:
Niko the Fox A stylized 3D stealth platformer. 

Following Niko, a fox with empty beginnings on an adventure to learn more about his past, but not all is as it seems.

The game is best enjoyed with sound and has support for Gamepad Input.


This game was created as part of the 7 day Kindred Community Game Jam #6, focused around the theme "At the beginning... there was nothing." 

Development team:

  • Lead Composer and Level Designer - Prestige
  • Lead Artist - Petar Pehchevski 3D
  • Lead Developer - Mike Seese (a.k.a Incanta Games)

Pre-made assets used for this game jam:

  • Multiple models for environment and props from  Aleksandr Ivanov's wonderful stylized asset packs
  • A few assets for environment and props from Kirill Sibiriakov's Industrial Area Hangar pack
  • Some sound effects from Splice
